name: iLove Ether
description:
Archival Pigment Print on Papyrus

As a 19x36" scroll, this piece is from the "iLove Letters" series. It is a personal love letter in original handwriting and encourages the idea of genuine self-appreciation.

Gift as a symbol of recognition for the intuitive loved one or as a personal gift for yourself.
Perfect for an art collector!

*Edition of 6

-Signed by the artist.

name: Summertime
description:
Archival Pigment Print on Wood

This refreshing image was shot on Large-Format, 4X5 Color Chrome film, retaining superior detail and color. It is mounted on a wood panel and has been finished in white on all sides.

"Summertime" is perfect for a reminder that there is something to look forward to in the summer heat! This piece works great as a gift, or for art collectors and photography enthusiasts. 

The simplicity and familiarity lends itself well to anywhere from a quaint country kitchen to a space waiting to be filled among other fine art pieces.


*All images are limited edition* This means that you can be assured that your print is one of a limited number. You will not buy a lovely piece, only to have envy that your friend or new associate owns a replica.

-Signed by the artist.

name: Glimmer
description:
Archival Pigment Print on Wood

This fictional photograph is part of a photo series entitled "Dichotomy". It is mounted on a wood panel and has been finished in black on all sides.


"Dichotomy" makes the perfect gift for art collectors, photography enthusiasts, and environmental buffs!

*All images are limited edition* This means that you can be assured that your print is one of a limited number. You will not buy a great piece, only to have envy that your friend or new associate owns a replica.

-Signed by the artist.

name: Emanate
description:
Archival Pigment Print on Wood

This inspiring black and white image was shot on Large-Format, 4X5 film, retaining superior detail. It is mounted on a wood panel and has been finished in black on all sides.

"Emanate" makes the perfect gift for art collectors, photography enthusiasts, nature lovers, and spiritual devotees. It's neutral, yet dynamic presentation allows it to fit seamlessly into the style, decor, and colors of any home or office.

*All images are limited edition* This means that you can be assured that your print is one of a limited number. You will not buy a lovely piece, only to have envy that your friend or new associate owns a replica.

-Signed by the artist.

name: Farewell
description:
Archival Pigment Print on Wood

This vibrantly colored photograph was taken as part of a photo series entitled "Breathing Earth". It is mounted on a wood panel and has been finished in black on all sides.

"Farewell" makes the perfect gift for art collectors, photography enthusiasts, and nature lovers alike!

*All images are limited edition* This means that you can be assured that your print is one of a limited number. You will not buy a lovely piece, only to have envy that your friend or new associate owns a replica.

-Signed by the artist.
